00026 #ifndef _INTITERATOR_H
00027 #define _INTITERATOR_H
00028 
00029 #include "IntNode.hxx"
00030 #include "IntList.hxx"
00031 
00032 // General iterator to access all of the items in a IntList.
00033 // When the IntList is modified, the IntIterator must be reset before 
00034 //   subsequent use.
00035 class IntIterator {
00036 public:
00037    IntIterator(const IntList& aList); // Iterates over aList. Iteration begins
00038                                       //  with the first list item.
00039    int next();                // Next list item.
00040                               //   ASSUME: There is a next item.
00041    bool more() const;         // Are there more list items?
00042    void reset();              // Reset the iterator to begin with the 
00043                               //   first list item.
00044 protected:
00045    const IntList& theList_;
00046    const IntNode* cursor_;
00047 };
00048 
00049 #endif
